H0.text: the length and direction of a straight line between two locations or positions. Distance

H1.text: the length and direction of a straight line between two locations or positions. Trajectory

H2.text: the length and direction of a straight line between two locations or positions. Vector

H3.text: the length and direction of a straight line between two locations or positions. displacement

A4.text: Displacement is a vector whose length is the shortest distance from the initial to the final position of a point P undergoing motion.

A5.text: Displacement is the shift in location when an object in motion changes from one position to another.
